titleStmt.title: The pleasaunt and vvittie playe of the cheasts renewed with instructions both to learne it easely, and to play it well. Lately translated out of Italian into French: and now set furth in Englishe by Iames Rowbothum.
Questo libro e da imparare giocare a scachi. English
titleStmt.author: Damiano, da Odenara.
Rowbothum, James.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Roulande Hall, for Iames Rowbothum, and are to be sold at hys shoppe vnder Bowe churche in Cheape syde,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Damiano da Odenara. Questo libro e da imparare giocare a scachi.
In the dedication Rowbothum says he is not the translator.
Running title reads: The cheastes playe.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: hys shoppe vnder Bowe churche in Cheape syde
